tika-vin07t30:2_1: Samathakkhandhake khīṇāsavassa vipulasatiṁ nissāya dātabbo vinayo codanādiasāruppānaṁ vinayanupāyo sativinayo.
tika-vin07t30:3_2: codentīti ettha pana ummattakassa idaṁ ummattakaṁ,
tika-vin07t30:3_5: Tena ummattakena cittavipariyāsakatena ajjhāciṇṇena anācārena āpannāya āpattiyā gaggaṁ bhikkhuṁ codentīti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin07t30:3_6: Paṭhamaṁ mūḷho hutvā pacchā amūḷhabhāvaṁ upagatassa dātabbo vinayo amūḷhavinayo.
tika-vin07t30:4_1: Dhammavādīnaṁ yebhuyyabhāvasampādikā kiriyā yebhuyyasikāti imasmiṁ atthe sa-
tika-vin07t30:4_5: Yebhuyyabhāvaṁ nissitasamathakiriyā yebhuyyasikāti evaṁ yebhuyyasikāsaddassa attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin07t30:4_7: Yathāvuttasalākaggāhena hi dhammavādīnaṁ yebhuyyabhāve siddhe pacchā taṁ yebhuyyabhāvaṁ nissāyeva adhikaraṇavūpasamo hoti,
tika-vin07t30:5_0: 207.“Sesamettha tajjanīyādīsu vuttanayamevā”ti etena tajjanīyādisattakammāni viya idampi tassapāpiyasikākammaṁ asucibhāvādidosayuttassa,
tika-vin07t30:5_1: saṅghassa ca vinicchaye atiṭṭhamānassa kattabbaṁ visuṁ ekaṁ niggahakammanti dasseti.
tika-vin07t30:5_2: Etasmiñhi niggahakamme kate so puggalo “ahaṁ suddho”ti attano suddhiyā sādhanatthaṁ saṅghamajjhaṁ otarituṁ,
tika-vin07t30:5_3: saṅgho cassa vinicchayaṁ dātuṁ na labhati,
tika-vin07t30:5_4: taṁ kammakaraṇamatteneva ca taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ vūpasantaṁ hoti.
tika-vin07t30:6_1: Keci panettha “so tathā niggahito niggahitova hoti,
tika-vin07t30:6_3: Teneva pāḷiyaṁ osāraṇā na vuttā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin07t30:6_4: Aññe pana “pāḷiyaṁ na upasampādetabbantiādinā sammāvattanassa vuttattā sammāvattitvā lajjidhamme okkantassa
tika-vin07t30:6_5: osāraṇā avuttāpi tajjanīyādīsu viya nayato kammavācaṁ yojetvā osāraṇā kātabbā evā”ti vadanti,
tika-vin07t30:6_8: vattaṁ paripūretvā paṭippassaddhiṁ labhissati. No ce,
tika-vin07t30:9_1: Virūpato vipariṇāmaṭṭhena cittaṁ dukkhaṁ vipaccatīti āha “cittadukkhatthaṁ vohāro”tiādi.
tika-vin07t30:10_0: Ādito paṭṭhāya ca tassa tassa kammassa viññātattāti vitthārato āgatakammavaggassa ādito paṭṭhāya vaṇṇanāmukhena
tika-vin07t30:11_1: Pāḷiyaṁ ajjhattaṁ vāti attani vā attano parisāya vā.
tika-vin07t30:11_2: Bahiddhā vāti parasmiṁ vā parassa parisāya vā.
tika-vin07t30:13_1: Sammutisabhāvāyapi āpattiyā kāraṇūpacārena akusalābyākatabhāvena vuccamāne kusalassāpi āpattikāraṇattā
tika-vin07t30:13_3: tathā avatvā “natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṁ kusala”nti evaṁvacanassa kāraṇaṁ dassetuṁ “ettha sandhāyabhāsitavasena attho veditabbo”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-vin07t30:13_5: yadi hi āpatti nāma paramatthadhammasabhāvā bhaveyya,
tika-vin07t30:13_7: Yasmā duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathādīsu dassitadosappasaṅgato paramatthasabhaāvatā na yuttā,
tika-vin07t30:13_9: tasmā “siyā akusalaṁ siyā abyākata”ntipi nippariyāyato na vattabbā.
tika-vin07t30:13_10: Yadi pana akusalaabyākatadhammasamuṭṭhitattameva upādāya pariyāyato “siyā akusalaṁ siyā abyākata”nti vuttaṁ.
tika-vin07t30:13_11: Tadā kusaladhammasamauṭṭhitattampi upādāya pariyāyato “āpattādhikaraṇaṁ siyā kusala”ntipi vattabbaṁ bhaveyya.
tika-vin07t30:13_12: Yato cetaṁ vacanaṁ āpattiyā akusalābyākatūpacārārahattassa kusalūpacārānārahattassa visuṁ kāraṇasabbhāvaṁ sandhāya bhāsitaṁ,
tika-vin07t30:13_13: tasmā yaṁ taṁ kāraṇavisesaṁ sandhāya idaṁ bhāsitaṁ,
tika-vin07t30:14_0: Idāni pana yo aṅgappahonakacittameva sandhāya āpattiyā akusalādibhāvo vutto,
tika-vin07t30:14_4: Āpattādhikaraṇe kusalacittaṁ aṅganti paṇṇattiṁ ajānitvā kusalacittena cetiyaṅgaṇādīsu bhūmisodhanādivasena
tika-vin07t30:14_6: Tasmiṁ satīti tasmiṁ āpattādhikaraṇe vijjamāne kusalacittasamuṭṭhitattena kusalavohārārahāya āpattiyā vijjamānāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin07t30:14_7: Sāratthadīpaniyaṁ pana “tasmiṁ satī”ti imassa “tasmiṁ kusalacitte āpattibhāvena gahite”ti attho vutto,
tika-vin07t30:15_0: Na sakkā vattunti yadi sammutisabhāvāyapi āpattiyā akusalādisamuṭṭhitattena akusalādivohāro karīyati,
tika-vin07t30:15_1: tadā kusalavohāropi kattabboti “natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṁ kusala”nti na sakkā vattuṁ,
tika-vin07t30:15_3: Tasmāti yasmā kusalādīnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ samānepi āpattiyā aṅgappahonakatte kusalavohārova āpattiyā paṭikkhitto,
tika-vin07t30:15_5: tasmā nayidaṁ aṅgappahonakaṁ cittaṁ sandhāya vuttanti “āpattādhikaraṇaṁ siyā akusalaṁ siyā abyākataṁ,
tika-vin07t30:15_6: natthi āpattādhikaraṇaṁ kusala”nti idaṁ āpattiyā samuṭṭhāpakattena aṅgappahonakaṁ kāraṇabhūtaṁ cittamattaṁ sandhāya na vuttaṁ,
tika-vin07t30:15_8: Etena āpattiyā akusalādibhāvopi kenaci nimittena pariyāyatova vutto,
tika-vin07t30:16_1: “āpattādhikaraṇaṁ siyā akusalaṁ siyā abyākata”nti idañhi yaṁ kiñci kadāci katthaci kāraṇaṁ bhavantaṁ aniyatakāraṇaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ na hoti.
tika-vin07t30:16_2: Yaṁ pana sabbasikkhāpadesu āpattiyā kāraṇaṁ bhavitumarahati,
tika-vin07t30:16_4: Akusalañhi paṇṇattiṁ ñatvā vītikkamantassa sabbāpattiyā kāraṇaṁ hoti,
tika-vin07t30:16_5: lokavajjāpattiyā pana paṇṇattiṁ ajānantassapi kāraṇaṁ hoti.
tika-vin07t30:16_6: Kevalaṁ paṇṇattivajjāpattīsu kusalābyākatacittapavattikkhaṇe eva akusalaṁ na vattati,
tika-vin07t30:16_8: Abyākataṁ pana kāyavacībhūtaṁ kusalākusalādīnaṁ pavattikkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannassa sahaseyyāpattiyanti
tika-vin07t30:16_9: sabbāpattiyā aṅgameva hoti channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ kāyavācaṅgavirahitattābhāvā.
tika-vin07t30:16_10: Tasmā imesaṁ akusalābyākatānaṁ sabbāpattimūlakattameva sandhāya idaṁ āpattiyā akusalattaṁ,
tika-vin07t30:16_12: Yattha pana pathavīkhaṇanādīsu kusalampi āpattiyā kāraṇaṁ hoti,
tika-vin07t30:16_13: tatthāpi āpattiyā tadupacārena kusalattavohāro ayutto sāvajjānavajjānaṁ ekattavohārassa viruddhattā.
tika-vin07t30:17_0: Tattha ekantato akusalamevāti akusalacittena samuṭṭhahanato kāraṇūpacārato evaṁ vuttaṁ.
tika-vin07t30:17_4: Akusalaṁ hotīti akusalasamuṭṭhitāya kāraṇūpacārena akusalaṁ hoti.
tika-vin07t30:17_9: aññatvā ca āpajjanavasena imaṁ vikappabhāvaṁ sandhāya akusalattaabyākatattasaṅkhātaṁ yathāvuttaṁ imaṁ vikappasabhāvaṁ sandhāya idaṁ vacanaṁ vuttaṁ.
tika-vin07t30:18_0: Yadi evaṁ asañciccāpajjanapakkhe kusalenāpi āpajjanato tampi vikappaṁ sandhāya “āpattādhikaraṇaṁ siyā
tika-vin07t30:18_1: kusala”ntipi kasmā na vuttanti āha “sace panā”tiādi.
tika-vin07t30:18_3: Acittakasamuṭṭhānānaṁ “kusalacittaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti etena sāvajjabhūtāya āpattiyā kāraṇūpacārenāpi anavajjabhūtakusalavohāro ayuttoti dasseti.
tika-vin07t30:18_4: “Na ca tatthā”tiādinā kusalassa āpattiyā kāraṇattaṁ vijjamānampi tathā voharituṁ ayuttanti paṭikkhipitvā
tika-vin07t30:18_12: “Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ siyā akusalaṁ siyā abyākata”nti idaṁ kāraṇūpacārena pariyāyato vuttaṁ,
tika-vin07t30:19_0: Yaṁ pana sāratthadīpaniyaṁ āpattiyā nippariyāyatova akusalādisabhāvataṁ samatthetuṁ bahuṁ papañcitaṁ,
tika-vin07t30:19_1: taṁ na sārato paccetabbaṁ duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṭṭhakathāyameva paṭikkhittattā.
tika-vin07t30:19_2: Tenevetthāpi “yaṁ cittaṁ āpattiyā aṅgaṁ hotī”tiādinā akusalacittassāpi āpattiyā kāraṇattena bhinnatāva dassitā.
tika-vin07t30:19_4: taṁ heṭṭhā dassitamevāti idha na vitthārayimha.
tika-vin07t30:19_5: Evaṁ vītikkamato yo vītikkamoti ettha akusalacittena ñatvā vītikkamantassa kāyavacīvītikkamasamuṭṭhitā āpattivītikkamoti vutto.
tika-vin07t30:22_1: Pāḷiyaṁ vivādādhikaraṇaṁ ekaṁ samathaṁ anāgammātiādi pucchā.
tika-vin07t30:22_3: Siyātissa vacanīyanti eteneva vūpasamaṁ siyāti vattabbaṁ bhaveyyāti attho.
tika-vin07t30:22_8: Ubbāhikāya khīyanake pācittiyaṁ na vuttaṁ tattha chandadānassa natthitāya.
tika-vin07t30:24_1: sammatīti ettha sammukhāvinayena apalokanādikammaṁ sampajjatīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
